metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35989 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the LXT2 zlib block allocationfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .lxt2 file can leadto arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
